search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for DoorLoop (doorloop.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for DoorLoop can be found at: [https://www.doorloop.com/pricing](https://www.doorloop.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Thank you! Your submission has been received!

Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.

Only $3/unit

Starter

_Built for independent property owners looking to simplify and automate portfolio management with all-in-one features that fit their basic needs._

$210000

$59 00

$210000

$6900

Per month. Billed annually.

Maximum Text

[Get Started](https://www.doorloop.com/pricing#)

**Starter plan includes:**

ⓘ

Online rent & fee payments

Make more money with automated payment collection by credit card, debit card, ACH, Google Pay, Apple Pay, or cash.

ⓘ

Tenant portal

Give your tenants online access to log in to their dedicated portal and make payments, send work orders, and submit renter’s insurance.

ⓘ

Collect all maintenance requests from tenants and manage from one central dashboard.

Maintenance management

ⓘ

Two-way communication

Send and receive SMS text messages easily and securely from a dedicated phone number.

ⓘ

Accounting & reporting

Manage your books with a chart of accounts, statements, and reports for each property.

ⓘ

Rental applications & screening

Find the best tenants for every property by running detailed criminal, credit, and eviction checks with TransUnion.

ⓘ

Lease management

Track tenant payments and requests with automated reminders, tasks, and more.

ⓘ

CashPayments powered by Western Union

Collect and track cash rent payments when tenants pay at a Western Union Quick Collect location.

ⓘ

Dashboards

Monitor your properties at a glance with key widgets and reports for accounting, leasing, payments, and more. Custom dashboard available on Premium plan.

ⓘ

World-class support

Get five-star support by email and chat, as well as unlimited access to our Help Center.

ⓘ

eSignature

Electronically sign any agreement. Additional fees apply.

ⓘ

CRM for tenants

Centralize all information and documents for every tenant in one place.'

Most Popular

Only $3/unit

Pro

_Built for property managers and owners looking to get organized with financial management, tenant communication, and financial reporting features._

Pro

Most Popular

$210000

$11900

$210000

$13900

Per month. Billed annually.

Contact Us

Contact Us

[Get Started](https://www.doorloop.com/pricing#)

**Everything in Starter and:**

ⓘ

Advanced accounting and reporting

Run full accounts payable and receivable for multiple portfolios, LLCs, and/or business entities

ⓘ

Live bank connect

Sync and reconcile your bank accounts easily and securely so you can match your bank transactions to your transactions in DoorLoop.

ⓘ

QuickBooks online sync

Send your income and expense transactions to QuickBooks Online

ⓘ

Tenant announcements

Send announcements in bulk or communicate with a select number of tenants from the same property by email or text.

ⓘ

Advanced maintenance management

Manage maintenance requests with real-time tracking, vendor management & payments, and automated workflows.

ⓘ

Outgoing payments

Send payments to vendors, owners, and tenants, and use 1099s when needed

ⓘ

Budgeting

Create customizable budgets on properties and portfolios, estimate rental income, and manage cash flow.

ⓘ

Email, chat, phone & Zoom support

Get world-class support by email, chat, phone, and Zoom, as well as unlimited access to our Help Center.

ⓘ

Listings

List your vacant units on Zillow, Dwellsy, Trulia, HotPads, and more.

ⓘ

User access roles

Control what parts of the software each user can view and edit

ⓘ

Calendar

Central hub to view important events like move-in and move-out dates, as well as all tasks, work orders, and maintenance requests

ⓘ

CAM charges

Automate recurring CAM charges monthly, or post CAM charges in bulk that can be automatically allocated based on square footage

ⓘ

Comprehensive reports

Advanced financial management with direct access to all of your data.

Only $3/unit

Premium

_Built for property managers, owners, and companies looking to maximize profits, efficiency, and growth with the most features & integrations.  
_

$210000

$16900

$210000

$19900

Per month. Billed annually.

Contact Us

[Get Started](https://www.doorloop.com/pricing#)

**Everything in Pro and:**

ⓘ

![Image 1](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f073e32d304276cc8b4ff30/63e4e8666c95f410dc3a61c5_star%201.svg)

VIP Priority Support

Get unlimited support sessions and priority response times from the most advanced members of our customer support team

ⓘ

Free incoming ACH payments

No incoming ACH fees when tenants and rent or other payments

ⓘ

Free personalized website

Professional website creation and setup at no extra cost to market your business, show off your listings, connect to your tenant portal, and more

ⓘ

Zapier Integration

Connect DoorLoop with thousands of programs using Zapier.com

ⓘ

Free eSignatures

Electronically sign unlimited agreements at no additional cost

ⓘ

Free bank account setup

Add unlimited bank accounts for free.

ⓘ

Custom convenience fees

Charge convenience fees to tenant payments to generate additional revenue.

ⓘ

Unlimited additional users

Get an unlimited number of users, including your accountants, leasing professionals, and more

ⓘ

Unlimited data storage

Save files, leases, photos, and anything else you need without storage limits

ⓘ

Advanced customizable dashboards

Customize your dashboard with the most helpful widgets and reports

ⓘ

API access

Integrate with any app using our open API, or use Zapier to connect DoorLoop with thousands of programs.

Onboarding fee based on portfolio size.

Accounting

Accounting & Financials

ⓘ

Keep track of your books for each property with their own chart of accounts, statements, and reports per property.

FAQS

Your Questions Answered
-----------------------

What is DoorLoop and whom is it for?

![Image 148](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031625d694aee83_icon_chevron.svg)

DoorLoop’s all-in-one property management software helps property managers and owners manage any portfolio effectively so that you can make more money, get organized, and grow.

We help you simplify property management by automating tenant and lease tracking, rent and fee collection, accounting and reporting, maintenance requests, and more through easy-to-use, secure, and reliable software.

What properties can I manage?

![Image 149](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031625d694aee83_icon_chevron.svg)

DoorLoop allows property managers and owners to manage any portfolio effectively, including:

1\. Residential (single-family, multi-family, mobile homes, student housing, etc.)

2\. Commercial (retail, office, industrial, etc.)

3\. Affordable Housing

4\. Community Associations

Who's DoorLoop for?

![Image 150](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031625d694aee83_icon_chevron.svg)

DoorLoop is built for property managers and owners to simplify property management by providing an easy-to-use, secure, and reliable software.

With cutting-edge technology, world-class support, and free educational resources, we empower you to grow personally, professionally, and financially.

We care about more than just your business – we care about you!

What are the most popular features?

![Image 151](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031625d694aee83_icon_chevron.svg)

With DoorLoop, you can do the following and much more:

1.  Market units and accept applications online
2.  Screen tenants with background checks
3.  Automatically fill and send lease agreements with eSignatures
4.  Collect rent online via ACH, debit, credit, and cash
5.  Provide tenant and owner portals to improve communications
6.  Handle vendor management and tenant maintenance requests
7.  Set automatic reminders for rent, renewals, and more
8.  Sync accounting and bookkeeping with QuickBooks
9.  Manage financial accounts
10.  Run unlimited custom reports instantly

Visit our [Features](https://www.doorloop.com/features) page to learn more.

‍

We are not computer savvy. Is it easy to use?

![Image 152](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031625d694aee83_icon_chevron.svg)

DoorLoop's software is incredibly easy to use and built to help you simplify property management so that you can make more money, get organized, and grow.

In addition to automating many of your manual tasks like rent collection and lease tracking, we provide a dedicated onboarding specialist, world-class support, and free educational resources to empower you to effectively manage your portfolio. Sign up for a [demo](https://www.doorloop.com/demo) of our software to learn more.

Can I use DoorLoop from my phone?

![Image 153](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031625d694aee83_icon_chevron.svg)

Yes, in fact, there is even an iPhone, iPad, and Android app available on the [Apple App store](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/doorloop/id1590868801) and [Google Play store](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.doorloop.mobile_app).

The best part is, nearly every single screen and feature on the Desktop version is available in the mobile app.

Now you can work and access all of your properties remotely no matter where you are in the world.

What is the process to get started?

![Image 154](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031625d694aee83_icon_chevron.svg)

DoorLoop makes it incredibly easy to begin managing your portfolio with our easy-to-use, secure, and reliable software in two easy steps:

Step 1 - Schedule a [demo](https://www.doorloop.com/demo) with our sales team to set up your DoorLoop account, select a plan for your portfolio, and add your payment info.

Step 2 - Migrate your data, set up your merchant account to receive rent payments, and complete training with your assigned onboarding specialist.

Once set up, we empower you to grow personally, professionally, and financially with world-class support, and free educational resources.

Click [here](https://www.doorloop.com/demo) to get started.

I have more questions

![Image 155](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031625d694aee83_icon_chevron.svg)

If you are an existing customer with questions, please [log in](https://app.doorloop.com/auth/login) to your DoorLoop account and contact support via chat.

If you are a potential customer interested in learning more about our software, please request a [demo](https://www.doorloop.com/demo).

What are your prices?

![Image 156](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031625d694aee83_icon_chevron.svg)

Prices start at only $69/month for your first 20 units.

You will receive free updates, a dedicated account manager, training and support.

Do I need a credit card to try it?

![Image 157](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031625d694aee83_icon_chevron.svg)

Absolutely not! All you need is your email address.

You will have the option to upgrade to a paid account at anytime.

Which pricing plan is best for me?

![Image 158](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031625d694aee83_icon_chevron.svg)

If you have under 10 units and no employees, the Starter plan could be a good fit. We would recommend the Pro plan for 10+ units, and then the Premium plan for anyone who needs unlimited flexibility and customization with our API and integrations.

How will monthly billing work?

![Image 159](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031625d694aee83_icon_chevron.svg)

You can select to pay monthly for any of our plans (pay as you go). If you remove any units in the middle of the month, they will automatically be removed from your next monthly bill.

You can add more units anytime during the month, and it will be prorated based on how many days are left until your next bill. For example, if you add more units, and you are 20 days into your subscription, you will only be charged for 10 more days.

How will annual billing work?

![Image 160](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031625d694aee83_icon_chevron.svg)

Choose to pay annually for our plans and get up to 20% off, billed upfront for 12 months. For example, if you add 10 units on the basic plan, it would cost $708 upfront for the entire year ($69 x 12 months).

Any units you add will be prorated to your annual bill. For example, if you add an additional 20 units 3 months into your subscription, you’ll only be charged for the remaining 9 months at the monthly rate difference ($20/month difference x 9 months).

What are the value-add differences per plan?

![Image 161](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031625d694aee83_icon_chevron.svg)

On the Pro plan, you get decreased costs for the value-add services. On the Premium plan, many of the costs are waived.

‍  
Below is the full comparison between plans:

‍  
‍**Starter:**

*   $49 per merchant application
*   $3 per Document
*   $2.49 per ACH payment
*   Your own website for $99 monthly plus $199 setup fee (or $999/year)
*   $45 for background checks
*   Chat support and one onboarding session

‍**Pro:**

*   $25 per merchant application
*   $1 per Document
*   $0.99 per ACH payment
*   Your own website for $49 monthly plus $199 setup fee (or $499/year)
*   $35 for background checks
*   Chat and scheduled phone and zoom support with a tailored onboarding experience  
    

‍**Premium:**

*   Free merchant apps
*   Free Document eSignature
*   Free incoming ACH payments
*   Ability to charge ACH fees to generate more revenue
*   Your own free website
*   $25 for background checks
*   Chat and scheduled phone and zoom support with a tailored onboarding experience  
    
*   VIP priority support

Are there any contracts?

![Image 162](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031625d694aee83_icon_chevron.svg)

We believe you should have the freedom to use any software you like without being tied down by corporate contracts. With DoorLoop, you are free to cancel your account at any time or export your data and use another software.

Why is your price so low?

![Image 163](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031625d694aee83_icon_chevron.svg)

We are a privately owned company that is able to keep a low overhead and pass those savings onto you. By comparison, many of our competitors are publicly traded and need to charge high fees to please their shareholders.

Why do some companies hide their price or have no free trials?

![Image 164](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031625d694aee83_icon_chevron.svg)

While we can’t speak for all companies, in our experience they don’t show the price on their sites because they either negotiate heavily so you will never know if you’re getting the best deal, or because their price is so expensive they need to convince you over the phone why it’s worth it (while employing high-pressure sales tactics).

If they don’t allow you to try their software for free and want you to only schedule a demo, it’s most likely because they know the software is so complex and hard to use, you will be lost without extensive training. The problem is, every time you hire someone new, they need to go through hours and hours of training. We’re doing our best to change this industry and eliminate the need for long training and tech support calls by offering the easiest to use platform. We strongly believe you should be able to try before you buy, do your own research without being forced to get a demo and be pressured by a salesperson, and cancel anytime without penalty.

Who funds online rent, screening, eSign services?

![Image 165](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031625d694aee83_icon_chevron.svg)

There are two premium services you can offer your tenants at **_no cost to you._**

**Tenant Screening (by TransUnion)**: The cost to your prospective tenants is only $45 on the Starter plan, $35 on the Pro, and $25 on the Premium. It includes a US national criminal background check, eviction history, and credit report. You can also markup the cost and keep any profits.

**Credit Card and ACH Payments (by Stripe)**: Automate your rent collection with a one-time setup fee of $49 per bank account on the Starter plan, $25 on the Pro, and free on the Premium.

Your tenants pay a 3.25% platform fee for credit card payments or $2.49 for ACH ($1 on the Pro plan and free on the Premium plan). All fees are disclosed to tenants upfront for transparency.

**Other benefits include:**

1.  **Outgoing EFT payments:** $0.99 each under the Pro and Premium plans. You can also mail checks for $1.79.
2.  **eSignatures**: $1 per document regardless of how many people need to sign.

How much money am I losing by not using DoorLoop?

![Image 166](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031625d694aee83_icon_chevron.svg)

Sticking to old methods carries an “opportunity cost.” DoorLoop brings efficiency, letting you grow without increasing overhead. If you're exploring property management software, measure the following:

1.  Tenant turnover costs
2.  Missed rent revenue
3.  Overhead growth with added units
4.  Clients lost to competitors
5.  Costs of vacancies and poor marketing
6.  Time spent on tenant issues and maintenance

Having faced these issues ourselves, we refined our processes and integrated these solutions into DoorLoop. Many members say the software pays for itself through the automatic late fee collection alone!

Can I migrate my data to DoorLoop?

![Image 167](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031625d694aee83_icon_chevron.svg)

Yes. If you’re using another software or even a spreadsheet, our migration team will help migrate your current properties, units, tenants, owners, leases, and vendors into DoorLoop.

For more information, view our article on [Onboarding Data Migration](https://support.doorloop.com/en/articles/8608503-onboarding-data-migration).

Is my data backed up and protected?

![Image 168](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031625d694aee83_icon_chevron.svg)

Yes. Sleep well knowing your data is automatically backed up on numerous servers.

If you wish, you can also export and save a physical copy of your data to your computer. DoorLoop is hosted by Amazon Web Services (AWS), the leader in data security, which is also used by Netflix, LinkedIn, ESPN, Airbnb, Apple, Adobe, and many others. AWS protects your data with firewalls, security audits, and penetration tests.

Are my payments and data encrypted?

![Image 169](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031625d694aee83_icon_chevron.svg)

When you log into DoorLoop, the HTTPS link with a green bar or lock icon indicates secure SSL encryption for all communication in your browser. Your data benefits from 256-bit military-grade encryption, both when stored and during transfer.

Payments to DoorLoop and tenants' rent payment are PCI-compliant, processed directly to the credit card processor without passing through our servers.

Your tenants can pay rent online by credit or debit card or by ACH (powered by [Stripe](https://stripe.com/)). Learn more about DoorLoop’s [security](https://www.doorloop.com/security).

Do I need servers to run DoorLoop?

![Image 170](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031625d694aee83_icon_chevron.svg)

Not at all! As a cloud-based software, DoorLoop is accessible from any device or browser, including the following and more:

*   **Computers:** Mac, Windows PCs, Surface, Chromebook
*   **Mobiles:** iPhone, iPad, Android, Amazon Fire
*   **Browsers:** Chrome, Safari, Internet Explorer, Firefox, Opera

Work anywhere, anytime, on any device.

Can I block parts of the software from my team?

![Image 171](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031625d694aee83_icon_chevron.svg)

With user access roles, you can allow or block access to certain parts of the software from any user. You can also allow or block a user from creating, editing, viewing, or deleting anything.

For example, you could allow someone to add new tenants and view existing tenants, but not to edit or delete tenants. Or you could completely block access to all financials, accounting, and reports.

Do you do background checks on your employees?

![Image 172](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031625d694aee83_icon_chevron.svg)

We thoroughly vet every potential employee before offering them a position at DoorLoop.

We have a rigorous interview process, verify their identity with multiple forms of identification, check employment references, run employment verification, and conduct criminal background checks.

All employees must sign confidentiality and non-disclosure agreements and undergo extensive training before they can begin working at DoorLoop.

Do you have a bug bounty program?

![Image 173](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031625d694aee83_icon_chevron.svg)

Yes, for security purposes. As users of our own software, security is our highest priority. If you are a security researcher and discover any potential vulnerabilities, please contact us.

How can I delete all my data?

![Image 174](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031625d694aee83_icon_chevron.svg)

If you have full admin access on your account, you can delete all your data yourself by selecting every item on each page and mass deleting it.

After verifying your identity extensively, we can also delete your entire account for you.

Deletion is permanent and there is no recycle bin or recovery.

How secure is your API?

![Image 175](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031625d694aee83_icon_chevron.svg)

If you want to use our API to integrate with any other app, feel safe knowing everything is encrypted at rest and in transit using an AES-256 encryption algorithm.

Every plan includes enterprise-level security with TLS/SSL application endpoints, strong cipher suites, Perfect Forward Secrecy, and more.

Feel free to test our API using the Qualys SSL Labs test, where we receive an A+ grade.

Do you have 2-Step Verification?

![Image 176](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031625d694aee83_icon_chevron.svg)

Yes. For increased security, you can receive an email with a one-time code when logging into your account.

Thank you! Your submission has been received!

Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.

Set your business up for growth
-------------------------------

Make more money, get organized, and grow your business with the highest-rated property management software.

DoorLoop is the highest-rated property management software that helps you make more money, get organized, and grow your portfolio. Schedule a demo to learn more.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is tiered based on features and user needs, with additional fees for onboarding and certain services.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Built for independent property owners looking to simplify and automate portfolio management with all-in-one features that fit their basic needs.
Built for property managers and owners looking to get organized with financial management, tenant communication, and financial reporting features.
Built for property managers, owners, and companies looking to maximize profits, efficiency, and growth with the most features & integrations.
